name: Ferret Forest Life Simulator
description:
Find a mate to create a little family of little funny polecats, feed them and protect! There are a lot of animals who are going to kill you at the first moment of seeing – so there’d be anybody to take care of your descendants! Don’t forget to mind such personal indicators as health, hunger, and energy: if one of them drops, your chances to survive will drop too! Search for tasty food like eggs of little birds to feed your progeny properly!

Earn points for each successfully done mission and power your weasel up! Unlock various colorful skins to customize it as you wish! Improve your ferret’s attacks, endurance, and jumping skills to protect your family and live longer! Check different skins of different species – beech marten, pine marten, sable, stoat, marbled polecat, Siberian weasel, black polecat, pale weasel or even tayra!

Feel like a small ferret scared by hungry red fox and hiding in the shadow of night forest! Avoid attacks of larger predators, chase fowl, frogs and toads raise up your little cubs and have fun with Ferret Forest Life Simulator!

Ferret Forest Life Simulator features:
• Ultimate wild ferret simulator
• Opportunity to mate and raise a family
• A wide range of different animals to fight with
• Unlockable skins for your weasel
• Amazing 3D graphics
